name: Cube Horde
description:
Cube Horde is a game in which your skill in escaping ZOMBIES will be checked. Collect coins and do not get bitten!

Cube Horde is an arcade game in which you have to escape from Zombies. Collect coins to get the points. Be careful not to fall!

Use the arrow keys or AWSD keys to move.
Good luck;)

Hello, Cube Horde is the first game I made. So far, it is in the creation phase, however, for a moment, I have the pleasure of presenting you with its playable versions!

Please comment I will try to take all of them into account and improve my game.
Stay tuned because I still have many plans to add new and interesting game modes !!

WHAT IS NEW - v0.3.2

-New death screen when player fall of the arena

-Fixed AI - opponents do not stop in front of the player

-This version is also available as a WebGL application
